channel.title: Any One Know How To Make ::Ban(ServerOwner) BackFire Doing ....(Inside)
channel.description:
I Want To Make It Where If A Staff Member Trys To Ban Me(ServerOwner) It BackFire Doing
1.)If User Who Is Trying To Ban (ServerOwner)*Has 3 Player Rite's* It Auto IP Ban's 2.)If User Who Is Trying To Ban (ServerOwner)*Has 2 Player Rite's*1st Try It Auto Warns And 2nd Try It Auto Demote's Them To A Reg. Player 0 Rite's 3.)If User Who Is Trying To Ban (ServerOwner)*Has 1 Player Rite's*1st Try It Auto Mute's And 2nd Try It Auto Ban's For (A Certain Time*I Can Unban If Not Able To Auto Unban Person*)
Any One Got A TUT Link Or Willing To Post In This Topic I Have A Feeling Others Would Like To Know This Aswell
NOTE 1: I would Like To To Send Message To User Trying To Ban(ServerOwner) Can See It (Refer To NOTE 2 And NOTE 3)
NOTE 2: I Would Like It To Have A Time Delay So The User Trying To Ban(ServerOwner) Get's Time To Veiw (Refer To NOTE 1)
NOTE 3: I Would Like The Auto Sent Message To Say The Punishment For What Try *Depends On Player Rite's So Keep This In Mind)

item.title: Any One Know How To Make ::Ban(ServerOwner) BackFire Doing ....(Inside)
item.dc:creator: @hydra_dragon hydra dragon
item.description:
@hydra_dragon wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:6, topic:151194”]this was a quick thing i put together give me a sec and ill fix it

EDIT:fixed

if(command.startsWith("banuser")) {
String victim = command.substring(8);
if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("blitz")){
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
appendToBanned(playerName);
System.out.println(playerName+"is banning themself because they tried to ban the owner");
sendMessage("you were succesfully banned because you tried to ban the owner");
BufferedWriter bw = null;
}
else{
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;} }

i even put the code in lesser bytes

now i hope this helps :)[/quote]Thanx

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:4, topic:151194”]get better staff in the first place![/quote]I Ain’t Hosted Yet Ima Just Saying Cuz Neva Kno =P

Read full topic

item.title: Any One Know How To Make ::Ban(ServerOwner) BackFire Doing ....(Inside)
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:1, topic:151198”] if(command.startsWith("banuser")) { String victim = command.substring(8); if(!victim.equalsIgnoreCase("[yournamehere]")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; } else { PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; appendToBanned(playerName); System.out.println(playerName+" is banning themself because they tried to ban owner"); sendMessage("you were succesfully banned because you tried to ban the owner"); } }

hope this helps :)[/quote]
wouldnt you flip it so the ban yourself methed comes first, then anything else goes as normal?
